title: 10 perches solid build brand new house for sale at Malabe.
details:
Dear Sir /Madam.

please find the property details.

10 perches 150 meters to main road , located at Malabe, Rathnarama road.

04 beds with attached bath rooms, living, dining, pantry, kitchen, TV lobby, courtyard, A/C rooms etc..,

Parking for 2 vehicles with roller shutters, maids room with attached bath. 3200 sqf,

Highly residential area. 20 foot road acces

Price. 24 million. Negotiate

Please call for more details

Regards
Dilan
